excerpt: Curious to know the Duster Episode 3 release date and time? Check out all the details on that and more here.

text: The Duster Episode 3 release date and time are right around the corner. The first episode showcased Agent Nina receiving the task to defeat a crime lord. She ends up targeting a skilled getaway driver named Jim, which leads to a series of twists and turns. Here’s all you need to know about the release date of Episode 3 of Duster and how to stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 3 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 29, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 29, 20259 PMPacific TimeMay 29, 20256 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the series right here. Where to watch Duster Episode 3 You can watch Duster Episode 3 via HBO Max. HBO Max is a hugely popular streaming service that offers premium content. It combines content from HBO, Warner Bros., New Line Cinema, DC, CNN, Cartoon Network, and more. Further, the platform features a vast library of movies, TV shows, documentaries, and original programming, including acclaimed series like The White Lotus, Euphoria, and Succession. Fans can stream all the episodes of the Duster on HBO Max after paying for a subscription, as it does not offer free trials. What is Duster about? Duster takes the viewers through the journey of the FBI’s first-ever female Black agent and a getaway driver fighting bravely against a gang of criminals. The official synopsis for the Duster series is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 3 release date and time are right around the corner. The first episode showcased Agent Nina receiving the task to defeat a crime lord. She ends up targeting a skilled getaway driver named Jim, which leads to a series of twists and turns.

Here’s all you need to know about the release date of Episode 3 of Duster and how to stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 3 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 29, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the series right here.

Where to watch Duster Episode 3

You can watch Duster Episode 3 via HBO Max.

HBO Max is a hugely popular streaming service that offers premium content. It combines content from HBO, Warner Bros., New Line Cinema, DC, CNN, Cartoon Network, and more. Further, the platform features a vast library of movies, TV shows, documentaries, and original programming, including acclaimed series like The White Lotus, Euphoria, and Succession. Fans can stream all the episodes of the Duster on HBO Max after paying for a subscription, as it does not offer free trials.

What is Duster about?

Duster takes the viewers through the journey of the FBI’s first-ever female Black agent and a getaway driver fighting bravely against a gang of criminals.

The official synopsis for the Duster series is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
